projects.title: Some of my projects
projects.description:
Passionate about computers and technology, I develop my skills during my training and in my free time by carrying out various projects.

You will find below some of my projects available on my GitHub.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description:
To improve my website's visibility, I use a thrird-party service to gather data about the use of my portfolio.

The collected data is not, and will never be personal data.



You can view the full list of the data gathered on 's website.



If you don't want your data to be collected, you may opt-out by enabling the "Do Not Track" option from your web browser.
